Export.Routine:
WWWFORM75
#include WWWConst #include COMSYS
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; PARAMETERSUCHE ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 02-Sep-2005 JW SR12966: WWW120 is shared ; 04-APR-2005 TYBD IDs FOR BUTTON ADDED FOR TESTDIRECTOR ; 30,01,2004 TYBD ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- quit
PARASUCHNEW ; DO NOT USE - Retained as legacy entry point - should not be needed ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Parameter Search function ; ; ; History: ; 11-Jan-2010 GRF Remove commented code; swap tags & call to reduce steps ; 15-Feb-2008 GRF Moved quit before commented code for performance ; 25-Jun-2007 shobby SRBR014409: Call out to rewritten version. ; 01-Sep-2006 JW SR14985: Fire on blur event instead of focus or savenow. ; 15-Dec-2005 JW SR13195: Don't call BEARB here ; 23-Aug-2005 JW SR12876: Also do parameter search for files. ; 14-Jul-2005 JW SR12963: Field colour was being set to white. Removed. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do PARASUCH quit
PARASUCH ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Parameter Search function ; ; History: ; 22-May-2013 shobby CORE-107.1: YPOPUP parameter to mark a form opened in a popup window. ; 19-Jun-2012 shobby SR17790: If dialog closing from a timeout, then close the parent window. ; 23-Jul-2007 RPW SRBR014600: Do not restrict scrolling on the COMView. ; Get the width and height via a callback to check the ; COMViewUserSize global ; 06-Jul-2007 RPW SRBR014409: Call structure instead of the if 1 {} block ; 05-Jul-2007 shobby SRBR014409: MSIE test replaced. Avoid multiple calls to UMLAU ; 08-Jun-2007 shobby SRBR014409: Rewrote ; 01-Sep-2006 JW SR14985: Fire on blur event instead of focus or savenow. ; 15-Dec-2005 JW SR13195: Don't call BEARB here ; 23-Aug-2005 JW SR12876: Also do parameter search for files. ; 14-Jul-2005 JW SR12963: Field colour was being set to white. Removed. ; 07.12.2004 FIS 26951 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new lstJS1,lstJS2,strField,strJS,strLinkType,STRUCT
if (YHID'=1) && ((+$$$WWW122RelationWithSearchFuncti(YSATZ)'=0) || (YTYPE="FILENAME")) { ;PARAMETERSUCHE write YCR set STRUCT = "" set lstJS1 = "" set lstJS2 = "" set strLinkStart = "" set strLinkEnd = "" do SearchStructure(.STRUCT) set strField="Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN if STRUCT'="" { set strLinkType = "HREF" set URL = YAKTION_"EP=WWWMANU&YEXEC=*D|^WWWPARAEXPL&YUSER="_YUSER_"&YBED="_YBED_"&YTRAKT="_YTRAKT set URL = URL_"&YUCI="_$get(YUCI)_"&YM="_YM_"&YKEY="_YKEY_"&YBACK="_YBACK_"&YLFDAT="_strField set URL = URL_"&YLFFORM="_$get(YBBN)_"&YFORM="_YFORM_"&YPARA="_STRUCT set URL = URL_"&YPOPUP=1" ;CORE-107.1 set OPT = "HEIGHT=500,WIDTH=400,SCROLLBARS=YES,RESIZEABLE=YES" set lstJS1 = $listbuild("var parameter=window.open('"_URL_"','Stucture','"_OPT_"');")
} else { set strLinkType = "class" set strJS = $$$GetSizeEvent(Y,strField)
set URL = YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM=WWWPARA&YUSER="_YUSER_"&YBED="_YBED_"&YTRAKT="_YTRAKT set URL = URL_"&YUCI="_$get(YUCI)_"&YM="_YM_"&YLFDAT="_strField_"&YLFFORM="_$get(YBBN) set URL = URL_"&YPOPUP=1" ;CORE-107.1 /*if ($get(YUSERAGENT)="MSIE") || ($get(YUSERAGENT)="") { set lstJS1 = lstJS1_$listbuild("var jetzt=new Date();")
;--------------------------------------- ; FIXME : <GRF> I believe "&YSEC" below should be "&YSEC" to match contents of URL. ; Not subsequently being converted. NOTE - similar changes were reverted due to FF issues. ;--------------------------------------- ;if YBED["SHOBBY" set strJS=strJS_" alert(1); " set strJS = strJS_"result = window.showModalDialog('"_URL_"&YSEC='+ jetzt.getSeconds() ,'Parameter'," ; e.g. set strJS = strJS_"result = window.showModalDialog('"_URL_"&YSEC='+ jetzt.getSeconds() ,'Parameter'," set strJS = strJS_"'DialogWidth:'+ "_strField_"Width+'px; DialogHeight: '+"_strField set strJS = strJS_"Height+'px; resizable: yes; status: no; help: no;');" } elseif ($get(YUSERAGENT)="CHROME") {*/ set strJS = strJS_"var left = (screen.width/2)-("_strField_"Width/2);" set strJS = strJS_"var top = (screen.height/2)-("_strField_"Height/2);" set strJS = strJS_"$('#"_strField_"').attr('retorno', 5);" set strJS = strJS_"window.open('"_URL_"','Pesquisar_Documento','toolbar=0,scrollbars=0,resizable=1," set strJS = strJS_"width='+"_strField_"Width+',height='+"_strField_"Height+',left='+left+',top='+top);" set strJS = strJS_"return;" /*} else {
set strJS = strJS_"result = newModalDialog('"_URL_"','Parameter',"_strField_"Height,"_strField_"Width,'yes');" }*/ set strJS = strJS_"if (result=='## timeout ##') {" ;SR17790 set strJS = strJS_" result='';" ;SR17790 set strJS = strJS_" CSPLogout(); " ;SR17790 set strJS = strJS_"}" ;SR17790 set lstJS1 = lstJS1_$listbuild(strJS) } write $$CreateOnClick^WWWBUTTON(strField,"search1.gif",$$^WWWTEXT(148),"BUTTON_SEARCH"_YLFN,lstJS1,lstJS2,strLinkType) } quit
SearchStructure(&pstrStructure) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Get the data structure for the search if it exists. ; ; Inputs: ; pstrStructure: The structure we found if any ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 06-Jul-2007 RPW SRBR014409: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new REL,FIX,NR,idxYMUMLAU,idxRELUMLAU
set REL = $piece($get(YDVOR),Y,8) set FIX = $piece($get(YDVOR),Y,9) if REL="" set YREL = $piece(YSATZ,Y,32) ;FIXME : Should this be REL? if FIX="" set FIX = $piece(YSATZ,Y,33) if (REL'="") { set idxYMUMLAU = $$$Index(YM) set idxRELUMLAU = $$$Index(REL) if ($data(^WWWSTRUKTURs(0,1,idxYMUMLAU,idxRELUMLAU))) { set NR = "" for { set NR = $order(^WWWSTRUKTURs(0,1,idxYMUMLAU,idxRELUMLAU,YM,NR)) quit:NR=""
if $piece($get(^WWWSTRUKTUR(0,YM,NR,1)),Y,2)=FIX set pstrStructure = NR quit:pstrStructure'="" } } } quit
READONLY ;bei onchange=readOnly ANDERER FELDER ;next to other if $piece($get(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,82)=1 if $piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,82)=1 quit ;DURCH EVENTBROKER BEI STÄND. FELDBVALIDIERUNG new HIDDENF,TRIGGER,LFN1,TRIGGERN,TRIGGER1 set TRIGGER1 = $translate($piece(YSATZ,Y,84),";",",") set HIDDENF = $translate($piece(YSATZ,Y,82),";",",") quit:HIDDENF=""
write YCR," onChange='" for TRIGGERN=1:1 set TRIGGER=$piece(TRIGGER1,",",TRIGGERN) do quit:$piece(TRIGGER1,",",TRIGGERN+1)="" ;ALLE TRIGGER AUSWERTEN . set OPERA=TRIGGER . for %II=1:1:$length(OPERA) do ;RAUSFILTER DER VERGLEICHSOPERATOREN ;the . . if '$find("'<>=",$extract(OPERA,%II)) set $extract(OPERA,%II)="#" . ; . set OPERA=$translate(OPERA,"#") ;NUR VERGLIECHSOPERATOREN ERLAUBT ;only permissive . if TRIGGER="" if YTYP'=2 write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value != """")" . if TRIGGER="" if YTYP=2 write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".checked == true)" ;READONLY BEI CHECKBOXEN . if (OPERA="")||(OPERA="=") if TRIGGER'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value == """_$translate(TRIGGER,"=")_""")" . if TRIGGER="'" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value == """")" . if OPERA="'" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value != """_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_""")" . ;NEU GRÖßER/KLEINER/NICHT GLEICH ;recent without delay . if OPERA="'=" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value != """_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_""")" . if OPERA="<" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value < "_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA=">" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value > "_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA="'<" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value >= "_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . if OPERA="'>" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value <= "_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . ; . write "{" . for HIDDENF(1)=1:1 set HIDDENF(2)=$piece(HIDDENF,",",HIDDENF(1)) quit:HIDDENF(2)="" do . . set YLFN1 = $piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,HIDDENF(2),1)),Y,1) ;datenfeld . . if YLFN1="" set YLFN1=HIDDENF(2) . . if $piece(YVOR,Y,77)'="" write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".style.background="""_$piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,$piece(YVOR,Y,77),1)),Y,1)_""";" . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".readOnly=true;" . . if YART="M" write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".value="""";" ;FELDINHALT LÖSCHEN . write "}" . ; . if TRIGGER="" if YTYP'=2 write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value =="""")" . if TRIGGER="" if YTYP=2 write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".checked == false)" ;READONLY BEI CHECKBOXEN . if OPERA="" if TRIGGER'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value != """_$translate(TRIGGER,"'")_""")" . if OPERA="'" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value =="""_$translate(TRIGGER,"'")_""")" . if OPERA="'=" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value =="""_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_""")" . if OPERA="<" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value >="_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA=">" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value <="_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA="'<" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value <"_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . if OPERA="'>" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value >"_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . write "{" . for HIDDENF(1)=1:1 set HIDDENF(2)=$piece(HIDDENF,",",HIDDENF(1)) quit:HIDDENF(2)="" do . . set YLFN1=$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,HIDDENF(2),1)),Y,1) ;datenfeld . . if YLFN1="" set YLFN1=HIDDENF(2) . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".style.background=""white"";" . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".readOnly=false;" . ; . write "}"
write "'" quit
WRITE ;bei onchange=write enable ANDERER FELDER;TYBD;4.5.2004 EINGETRAGEN IN PROGRAMM ;next to other regd. within programme if $piece($get(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,82)=1 if $piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,82)=1 quit ;DURCH EVENTBROKER BEI STÄND. FELDBVALIDIERUNG new HIDDENF,TRIGGER,LFN1,TRIGGERN,TRIGGER1 set TRIGGER1 = $translate($piece(YSATZ,Y,85),";",",") set HIDDENF = $translate($piece(YSATZ,Y,83),";",",") quit:HIDDENF=""
write YCR," onChange='" for TRIGGERN=1:1 set TRIGGER=$piece(TRIGGER1,",",TRIGGERN) do quit:$piece(TRIGGER1,",",TRIGGERN+1)="" ;ALLE TRIGGER AUSWERTEN . set OPERA=TRIGGER . for %II=1:1:$length(OPERA) do ;RAUSFILTER DER VERGLEICHSOPERATOREN ;the . . if '$find("'<>=",$extract(OPERA,%II)) set $extract(OPERA,%II)="#" . set OPERA=$translate(OPERA,"#") ;NUR VERGLIECHSOPERATOREN ERMITTELN ;only find . if TRIGGER="***" set TRIGGER=$$PWD^WWWINPWD() quit . if TRIGGER="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value != """")" . if (OPERA="") || (OPERA="=") if TRIGGER'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value == """_$translate(TRIGGER,"=")_""")" . if TRIGGER="'" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value == """")" . if OPERA="'" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value == """_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_""")" . ;NEU GRÖßER/KLEINER/NICHT GLEICH ;recent without delay . if OPERA="'=" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value == """_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_""")" . if OPERA="<" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value >= "_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA=">" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value <= "_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA="'<" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value < "_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . if OPERA="'>" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,999)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value > "_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . write "{" . for HIDDENF(1)=1:1 set HIDDENF(2)=$piece(HIDDENF,",",HIDDENF(1)) quit:HIDDENF(2)="" do . . set YLFN1=$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,HIDDENF(2),1)),Y,1) ;datenfeld . . if YLFN1="" set YLFN1=HIDDENF(2) . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".style.background="""_$piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,$piece(YVOR,Y,77),1)),Y,1)_""";" . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".readOnly=true;" . write "}" . if TRIGGER="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value !="""")" . if OPERA="'" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value !="""_$translate(TRIGGER,"'")_""")" . if OPERA="'=" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value !="""_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_""")" . if OPERA="<" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value <"_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA=">" if $extract(TRIGGER,2,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value >"_$extract(TRIGGER,2,999)_")" . if OPERA="'<" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value >="_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . if OPERA="'>" if $extract(TRIGGER,3,99)'="" write " if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN_".value <="_$extract(TRIGGER,3,999)_")" . write "{" . for HIDDENF(1)=1:1 set HIDDENF(2)=$piece(HIDDENF,",",HIDDENF(1)) quit:HIDDENF(2)="" do . . set YLFN1=$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,HIDDENF(2),1)),Y,1) ;datenfeld . . if YLFN1="" set YLFN1=HIDDENF(2) . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".style.background=""white"";" . . write "document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_""_YART_YLFN1_".readOnly=false;" . write "}"
write "'" quit
HyperEvent() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Code for JS calls ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 22-Nov-2013 shobby CORE-289: Change the event for options buttons to trigger onclick rather than onblur. ; 17-Oct-2012 shobby SR18066: Reverted trigger to blur ; 09-Oct-2012 shobby SR18066: Trigger off change rather than blur. ; 06-Sep-2010 shobby SR17449: Make Enter work as tab key for firefox. ; 29-Jul-2009 shobby SRAdhoc: Try moving the OnBlur of checkboxes to OnClick. ; 10-Feb-2009 shobby SR16126:Made previous change optional based on a company parameter. ; 12-Nov-2008 shobby SR16126:Simulate commas in a primary key. ; 27-Mar-2007 JW SR15384: Removed Primary Key event call. Use better variables. ; 21-Aug-2006 FrankF SRBR014066: Passing the page number to the server. ; 10-Aug-2006 JW SR13594: Created (encapsulated from WWWFORM7) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idRelClass,intDisplay,strOnBlur,strText,YART1,YLFN1
set idRelClass = YPARA(1) set intDisplay = YPARA(20)
set strOnBlur = ""
if ($get(YPARA(67))'="")||($$$WWW122ExecuteOnBlur(YSATZ)'="")||(intDisplay=1) { // If sending relation to a field OR on blur code OR display relations after input
if ((YART="P") && ( $data(^WWW129(0,YFORM,YLFN,1)) || $data(^WWW129(0,YFORM,YLFN,6)) )) || ; Primary keys OnChange/OnBlur event ((YART'="P") && ( $data(^WWW1291(0,YFORM,YLFN,1)) || $data(^WWW1291(0,YFORM,YLFN,6)) )) || ; Form Field OnChange/OnBlur event ((YHTMFORM'="WWW2") && (YTYP=3) && ($get(YPARA(67))="")) { ; Memo field, no parameter, no fast save (?)
// Do nothing
} else { set YLFN1="" set YART1=YART ; data item if YPARA(67)'="" { ; Form Field set YLFN1 = $piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,YPARA(67),1)),Y,1) ; Class Field from Form Field set YART1 = "D" if $piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,YPARA(67),1)),Y,1)="" set YART1 = "M" ; Manual field } if YLFN1="" set YLFN1 = YPARA(67) if YLFN1="" set YLFN1 = YLFN
if (idRelClass="") && ($$$WWW122ExecuteOnBlur(YSATZ)="") { // If has no relation class AND no execute on blur write YCR," onChange='if (document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_YART1_YLFN1_".value == """") {document."_YHTMFORM_".Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN1_".value = this.value;}'" ;wenn nur Werteübergabe ohne Feld
} elseif (idRelClass'="") && (intDisplay=1) && (YLFN1=YLFN) { // If has relation class AND display relations after input if (YTYP=2) || (YXTYP=3) { //Checkboxes if (YART1'="P") || (idRelClass'=YDATEI) { write YCR," onChange='retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""",this.checked,""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); '" } } elseif (+$$$WWW122PositionCaptionToAnswer(YSATZ)=0) { ;SR18066 $$$Append(strOnBlur," if (!this.readOnly) { retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","_THISVALUE_",""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); }") ;if $$MenuType^WWW013()'=14{ $$$Append(strOnBlur," if (doBlur(this)) { retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","_THISVALUE_",""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); }") ;SR18066 ;} } set YSHOWRELA = 1 } elseif (YXTYP=11) { ;Radio buttons ;CORE-289 write " onclick=' window.status="_THISVALUE_"; retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","_THISVALUE_",""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_""");' " ;SR18066 ;$$$Append(strOnBlur,strText) } else { if (YTYP=3) && (YLFN1'="") { // Memo fields ;WENN TEXTFELD ; WENN MIT PARAMETER oder inhalt in anderes feld (+ an der ersten stelle=addieren zum feld)
;SR18066 $$$Append(strOnBlur," if (!this.readOnly) { selval=this.value;") $$$Append(strOnBlur," if (doBlur(this)) { selval=this.value;") ;SR18066 if YHTMFORM'="WWW2" $$$Append(strOnBlur,"if (selval.length < 50 )") ; Don't Check if Fast Save $$$Append(strOnBlur," {") $$$Append(strOnBlur,"var nach=String.fromCharCode(124) ;var selval0=selval.replace(/\r\n/g,nach);") if YHYPER=0 $$$Append(strOnBlur,"selval=selval0.substring(0,1000);") ;eventbroker $$$Append(strOnBlur,"retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""",selval,""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_""");")
if (YHTMFORM="WWW2") && (YHYPER=0) { $$$Append(strOnBlur," retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","""",""6"",""LOCKSTART"");") $$$Append(strOnBlur," var x=1; var x1") $$$Append(strOnBlur," while (x<32) {") $$$Append(strOnBlur,"selval=selval0.substring((x*1000),(x*1000+1000));if (selval != """") retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""",selval,""2"",""PLUS"","""_YSEITE_""");") $$$Append(strOnBlur,"if (selval == """") {retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","""",""6"",""LOCKEND""); break;}") $$$Append(strOnBlur," x++; }") } $$$Append(strOnBlur,"}}") }
if (YTYP=2) || (YXTYP=3) { ;WENN MIT PARAMETER FÜR CHECKBOX oder inhalt in anderes feld if (($get(YONCHANGE)=1) && ((YXTYP=3) || (YXTYP=4))) || (YTYP=2) { ;AUCH CHECKBOX IN MANUELLEM FORMULAR write YCR," onClick=" kill YONCHANGE } else { write YCR," onChange=" } write "'retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""",this.checked,""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_""");'" }
if (YTYP'=3) && (YTYP'=2) && (YXTYP'=3) && (YLFN1'="") { ;WENN MIT PARAMETER oder inhalt in anderes feld ;when by means of parameter or within
if (YXTYP=6) || (YXTYP=20) { ;SR18066 $$$Append(strOnBlur," if (!this.readOnly) { selval=MULTISELECT"_YART1_YLFN_"();retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""",selval,""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); }") $$$Append(strOnBlur," selval=MULTISELECT"_YART1_YLFN_"(); if (doBlur(this,selval)) { retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""",selval,""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); }") ; SR18066
} else { ;SR18066 set strText = " if (!this.readOnly) { retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","_THISVALUE_",""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); }" set strText = " if (doBlur(this,"_THISVALUE_")) { retval = EventValue("""_YUCI_""","""_YUSER_""","""_YFORM_""",""FIX"_$translate(YKEY,".","~")_""",""Y"_YFORM_YART_YLFN_""","_THISVALUE_",""2"","""_YVARIA_""","""_YSEITE_"""); }" ;SR18066 if $get(YONCHANGE)=1 { ;CHECKBOX MIT ONCLICK if (YXTYP'=11) && (YXTYP'=2) && (YXTYP'=3) { write YCR," onChange=" kill YONCHANGE
} else { write YCR," onClick=" if ((YXTYP=11) || (YXTYP=2)) && ($get(YSORT)'="") && ($get(YPARA(5))'="") && ($order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,2,YSORT,YPARA(5)))="") && ($order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,2,YSORT))="") {
kill YONCHANGE ;NICHT IMMER KILLEN (RADIO-BUTTONS = MEHRERE AUSWAHLFLEDER) } } write "'"_strText_"'"
} else { $$$Append(strOnBlur,strText) } } } } } }
write YCR if (YART="P") { if '$data(^WWW129(0,YFORM,YLFN,14)) { ; no OnKeyDown js event if $$SimulateCommainPrimaryKey^WWW012() { ;write YCR," onKeyDown='switchKey(13,9); if (event.keyCode==188) {window.event.returnValue=false; this.value=this.value+"""_$$$FAKECOMMA_"""} '" ; SR17449 Is returning NO ACCESS error on FireFox write YCR," onKeyDown='if (document.all) { if (event.keyCode == 13) {event.keyCode = 9;} else if (event.keyCode==188) {window.event.returnValue=false; this.value=this.value+"""_$$$FAKECOMMA_"""} }'"
} else { ;write YCR," onKeyDown='switchKey(13,9);'" ;SR17449 Is returning NO ACCESS error on FireFox write YCR," onKeyDown='if (document.all) { if (event.keyCode == 13) {" write YCR,"event.KeyCode = 9;" write YCR,"} }'" } }
} else { if $$$WWW122SubmitFormOnChange(YSATZ) && '$data(^WWW1291(0,YFORM,YLFN,1)) { // submit OnChange, and no OnChange js event $$$Append(strOnBlur,"SAVENOW();") } } if strOnBlur'="" { write " onBlur='"_strOnBlur_"'" ;SR18066 write " onChange=' "_strOnBlur_"' " ;SR18066 } quit
